scripts.dev:dashboard: wrangler dev --env development && echo 'Dashboard available at http://localhost:8787/dashboard'
scripts.kv:event-ids:dev: CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID=7b67476729e32b63bb323f64706075c0 wrangler kv key list --remote -e development --binding EVENT_IDS -c wrangler.toml
scripts.kv:cache:dev: CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID=7b67476729e32b63bb323f64706075c0 wrangler kv key list --remote -e development --binding KV -c wrangler.toml
